Package org.purewidgets.client.feedback

Interface Summary
FeedbackDisplay The FeedbackDisplay interface defines the general contract for providing feedback about user input to a specific PdWidget.
InputEventAgeMessages InputEventAgeMessages provides internationalized messages about the aproximate age of the input event.
InputFeedbackListener The InputFeedbackListener defines methods associated with the life-cycle of a user input feedback panel.
 

Class Summary
AbstractInputFeedbackPanel The AbstractInputFeedbackPanel is an abstract implementation of a panel for user input feedback display on the public display.
CumulativeInputFeedbackPanel The CumulativeInputFeedbackPanel displays input feedback to the user, accumulating various feedback messages if they occur within a limited amount of time.
FeedbackSequencer The FeedbackSequencer sequences the showing and hiding of the input feedback panel for the PdWidget.
InputFeedback<T extends PdWidget> Represents the feedback information given by PdWidgets to the users.
MessagePattern MessagePattern defines string patterns that can be used on the input feedback panels to refer to various user input variables.
 

Enum Summary
Align The Align enumeration defines the possible values for aligment reference points for feedback display panels.
InputFeedback.Type The status of the feedback.
